text: Nashinoki Shrine Nashinoki Shrine (梨木神社) is a Shinto shrine in . Although it was never a Beppyo shrine, it used to have the rank of Bekkaku kanpeisha under the modern system of ranked Shinto shrines. Nashinoki Shrine is a relatively new Shinto shrine in Kyoto. It was built in 1885. The Nashinoki Shrine hosts an annual festival. == References == Category:Bekkaku kanpeisha Category:Shinto shrines in Kyoto
title: Nashinoki Shrine
